suppress.notes:
file name: snakeyaml-1.33.jar
We're not vulnerable because the YAML we're processing is under our control.
See also:
https://bitbucket.org/snakeyaml/snakeyaml/issues/531/stackoverflow-oss-fuzz-47081
and:
https://github.com/jeremylong/DependencyCheck/issues/4919
Library: santuario/xmlsec We're not vulnerable because we don't parse untrusted XML.
Libraries: several apache commons libraries We're not vulnerable because we don't use FTP.

file name: snakeyaml-1.33.jar
We're not vulnerable because the YAML we're processing is under our control.

file name: commons-fileupload-1.4.jar
We're not vulnerable because we don't allow uploading files.
